attributes.action: exempt patients suffering from Parkinson's Disease from prescription charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many patients who have to pay every month for drugs to treat Parkinson's Disease, which is unfair. It is a progressive condition for which there is no cure. Many other conditions such as hyperthyroidism and diabetes are covered by exemption to NHS presription charges, why not Parkinson' Disease?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "exempt patients suffering from Parkinson's Disease from prescription charges."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13269.asp

Prime Minister's Office
